data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Smoking in public is a health risk for all. In ____ decades, people ____ permitted ____ smoke ____ they ____. Furthermore, pregnant ____ were ____ of ____ dangerous ____ of ____ while ____. We can only hope that there will be stricter laws in the future.
data.partBlankContent: Smoking in public is a health risk for all. In prev____ decades, people we__ permitted t_ smoke wher____ they ple____. Furthermore, pregnant wo___ were una____ of t__ dangerous conseq______ of smo____ while preg____. We can only hope that there will be stricter laws in the future.
data.fullContent: Smoking in public is a health risk for all. In previous decades, people were permitted to smoke wherever they pleased. Furthermore, pregnant women were unaware of the dangerous consequences of smoking while pregnant. We can only hope that there will be stricter laws in the future.
data.answer: 在公共场所吸烟对所有人的健康都有危害。在过去的几十年里，人们可以随意吸烟。此外，孕妇对怀孕期间吸烟的危险后果一无所知。我们只能希望将来会有更严格的法律。
